entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
